response.overview: "Part one" of a collection of CG shorts from semi-hobbyist/professional Japanese CGI artists - both those who already worked on and would eventually work on stuff from Japanese industries (video games, films, commercials, etc.) - revolving around fictional/"virtual" young women. Meet mysterious Miharu, awesome Aya, ruthless Ryoko, mind-blowing Misty, youthful Yukari and heavenly Hikary in a stunning series of computer-generated femininity.
response.title: Virtual Star 2000 - Vol. 1
